schemes.name: Healthcare Subsidy Scheme
schemes.description: A scheme providing financial assistance for healthcare expenses.
schemes.benefits: Covers up to 50% of healthcare costs.

schemes.name: Education Assistance Scheme
schemes.description: Provides scholarships and education grants for underprivileged students.
schemes.benefits: Full tuition fee coverage for selected students.

schemes.name: Agricultural Loan Scheme
schemes.description: A loan scheme aimed at helping farmers with agricultural development.
schemes.benefits: Up to 1 lakh loan at low-interest rates.
